line.text:
Planned Work
[1] Van Cortlandt Park-bound trains skip 225 St, 231 St and 238 St

Days, 10:45 AM to 3 PM, Wed to Fri, Mar 30 - Apr 1 • Mon to Fri, Apr 4 - 8

For service to these stations, take the [1] to 242 St and transfer to a South Ferry-bound [1].

For service from these stations, take the Bx9 bus instead.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Planned Work
[7] Flushing-bound trains skip 33, 40, 46, 52 and 69 Sts

Days, 10:15 AM to 3 PM, Wed to Fri, Mar 30 - Apr 1

For service to these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or 74 St and
transfer to a Hudson Yards-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or Queensboro Plaza
and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[J] Broad St-bound trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St
[M] Forest Hills-bound trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Days, 9:45 AM to 3 PM, Wed to Fri, until Apr 29

For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[B] 145 St-bound trains run local from Kings Hwy to Prospect Park

Days, 10 AM to 3 PM, Wed to Fri, until Apr 15

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.text:

Jamaica Center-bound express service begins at 3 PM.

• Please allow additional travel time.

[M] Forest Hills-bound trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
[Q] No trains between 57 St-7 Av and Ditmars Blvd
[N] trains provide alternate service

Days, 10 AM to 3 PM, Tue to Fri, Mar 29 - Apr 1

[Q] service operates between Stillwell Av and 57 St-7 Av.

• Transfer between [N] and [Q] trains at Times Sq-42 St (across the platform).

*Please review [N] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.

Alternate travel note:
[R] service is also available at 5 Av/59 St and Lexington Av/59 St.
Transfer between [Q] and [R] at 57 St-7 Av.




Planned Work
[N] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av, 36 Av, Broadway and 30 Av

Days, 10:15 AM to 3 PM, Tue to Fri, Mar 29 - Apr 1

For service to these stations, take the [N] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [N].

For service from these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer
to an Astoria-bound [N].

Note: No [Q] service at these stations during this time.

line.name: SIR
line.text:
Planned Work
[SIR] Trains board at the St George-bound platform at Tompkinsville and Stapleton Stations

Days, 9 AM to 3 PM, Mon to Thu, Mar 28 - 31

line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2016  2:07PM

B13 buses are detoured, due to DOT road work on Pitkin Av between Autumn Av and Euclid Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Sutter Av, left on Autumn Av, right on Pitkin Av, left on Conduit Av, right on Crescent St and regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along the detoured route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2016  2:04PM

B38 buses are detoured in both directions. due to FDNY activity at DeKalb Av and Wilson Av.

Detour is as follows:

B38 Eastbound: Via Lafayette Av, left on Bushwick Av, right on Flushing Av, right on Wyckoff Av, left ton DeKalb Av and regular route.

B38 Westbound: Via DeKalb Av, right on Wyckoff Av, left on Flushing Av, left on Bushwick Av, right on DeKalb Av and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2016  2:06PM

Q7Â and Q8 buses are detoured in both directions due to milling on Pitkin Av between Autumn Av and Pine St.

Detour is as follows:

Q7 Westbound: Via Pitkin Av, left on South Conduit Av, right on Sutter Av, right on Logan St, right on Pitkin Av to Euclid Av and terminate.

Q7 Eastbound: Via Pitkin Av, right on Euclid Av, left on Sutter Av, left on North Conduit Av, right on Pitkin Av to regular route.

Q8 West/Gateway-bound: From Liberty Av, left on Euclid Av to regular route.

Q8 Eastbound From Gateway: Via Pitkin Av, right on Euclid Av, left on Sutter Av, left on North Conduit Av, right on Pitkin Av to regular route.

Q8 East/Euclid-bound: Via Liberty Av, left on Euclid Av to regular route.

Q8 Westbound (From Euclid Av): left on Sutter Av, left on North Conduit Av, right on Pitkin Av to regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made along detoured route.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
Q69 - Southbound stop on 28 St between Queens Plaza South and 42 Rd temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby temporary stop on 42 Rd between Jackson Av and 28 St.
[TP]

Until Apr 2016

Due to road work, please follow directional signage to the nearby stop on Beach 169 St at
Rockaway Point Blvd.

Click here for more detailed information about these changes.

line.name: Marine Parkway
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/15/2016 10:42AM

MPB - Rockaway Bound Ft. Tilden/Breezy Pt exit ramp closed through April due to planned work. Motorists must use the Riis Park/Far Rockaway exit. Signage is in place to direct motorists to a detour route. Expect delays.

Service Change  Posted: 03/10/2016  5:45AM

Planned Work:One roadway Rockaway bound will be closed each Monday at 7am and reopen each Friday after 1pm until mid-May. EXPECT DELAYS
